attributes.action: Stop Micheal Gove from ruining our A Level education
attributes.additional_details:
Not only has Micheal Gove proposed to get rid of January modular exams, it has been revealed today (23/1/13) that he also plans to put A Level exams at the end of two years rather than at the first.

There are a long list of downsides, however, most notably I think it's important to note that Universities use modular exams so why should it be any different in A Level which are supposed to prepare you for University.

STOP MICHEAL GOVE
